definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)

sentences.english: This picture is in the manner of Raphael.
sentences.chinese: 這幅畫模仿了拉斐爾的風格。

sentences.english: It was Nasri's job to attack United's right-back Rafael in the early minutes.
sentences.chinese: 比賽伊始，納斯里的職責是攻擊曼聯右後衛拉斐爾。

sentences.english: First Rafael Correa, the leftist economist, won the presidency.
sentences.chinese: 首先拉斐爾科雷亞，左派經濟學家，贏得總統寶座。

sentences.english: Rafael was scolded even though he hadnt been doing anything wrong.
sentences.chinese: 儘管拉斐爾沒做什麼錯事，但他還是捱罵了。

sentences.english: Aziraphale blinked, lowered his hands, and gingerly opened the door.
sentences.chinese: 亞茨拉斐爾眨眨眼，放下手，小心翼翼的打開車門。

sentences.english: Rafael was scolded even though he hadn't been doing anything wrong.
sentences.chinese: 儘管拉斐爾沒做什麼錯事，但他還是捱罵了。

sentences.english: It's a great clinical experience at St. Raphael's.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個偉大的臨牀經驗在聖拉斐爾的。

sentences.english: I'm not sure if it's actually possible for you to do good, " said Aziraphale.
sentences.chinese: 我不確定你是否會做好事，”亞茨拉斐爾說着。

sentences.english: RAFFAELE Beijing office is RAFFAELE headquarters in China.
sentences.chinese: 拉斐爾北京辦公室是拉斐爾在中國的總部。

sentences.english: RAFFAELE Beijing office is RAFFAELE headquarters in China.
sentences.chinese: 拉斐爾北京辦公室是拉斐爾在中國的總部。

sentences.english: That would have been an amazing accomplishment, to beat Rafa in the finals of the French Open.
sentences.chinese: 在法網決賽擊敗拉斐爾，那將會是非常了不起的成就。

sentences.english: Raphael's name on the armband, Strinati says, is a tribute to Chigi.
sentences.chinese: 斯提納地說，袖帶上拉斐爾的名字是向齊格表示敬意。

sentences.english: RAFFAELE is one of the leading interaction creative companies in China…
sentences.chinese: 拉斐爾是目前中國領先的互動創意公司之一。

sentences.english: Raffaele is also a gourmet and loves good food.
sentences.chinese: 拉斐爾也是一個美食家，喜歡各種好喫的食物。

sentences.english: The San Rafael Valley's topography and geology forms the headwaters of the Santa Cruz River.
sentences.chinese: 聖拉斐爾山谷的地形和地質形成聖克魯斯河的源頭。

sentences.english: The first pizza was made by a baker in Naples, Italy named Raffeale Esposito .
sentences.chinese: 第一個披薩是由意大利那不勒斯的麪包師拉斐爾。

definition: Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter
Michelangelo Buonarroti (1475-1564), Renaissance painter and sculptor
Honoré de Balzac (1799-1850), French novelist, author of series La comédie humaine
variant of 拿破崙|拿破仑[Na2 po4 lun2]
the Franks (Germanic people who arrived in Europe from 600 AD and took over France)
Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
Marcus Tullius Cicero (106-43 BC), famous Roman politician, orator and philosopher, murdered at the orders of Marc Anthony
Taiwan equivalent of 莫奈[Mo4 nai4]
